tha-ap149:0.3_0: held together by the most senior monk, who did not go to the world.
tha-ap149:1.1_0: I gained the best of men
tha-ap149:2.3_0: Thinking about the Teacher, the teaching,
tha-ap149:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap149:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap149:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Khujjasobhita.
tha-ap149:7.1_0: the seventh of the senior ones who goes.
